altTitles.en: Hey, I'm Not a Child Anymore, Right?

description.en:
1. Love Selection; Comic Megastore H 2006-02
Boy really wants to confess to the girl he likes. Then there's a school orgy.
2. Help Me! Misaki-san (Help me!美咲さん); Comic Megastore H 2005-11
Guy gets a free maid for a week. She's not very good at cooking or cleaning, but she does have one thing she's really good at.
3. Summer Fun / Natsu Asobi (夏遊び); Comic Megastore H 2005-09
Two cousins meet over a series of summers.
4. Sister Syndrome; Comic Megastore H 2005-07
A guy and his older sister. Incest.
5. Cream Processing Manual / Jissen Creme Taiou Manual (実践クレーム対応マニュアル); Comic Megastore H 2005-05
Businessman discovers the company he works for has special perks.
6. Molester Lessons /Chikan Lesson (痴漢レッスン); Comic Megastore H 2005-03
A girl follows her friend and her teacher in a special passenger car.
7. Favorite Menu; Comic Megastore H 2004-11
A guy receives a special offer to stop by at the family restaurant.
8. Hey, I'm Not a Child Anymore, Right? / Oniichan to Isshou! (お兄ちゃんと一緒!); Comic Megastore H 2004-09
One night a guy see his younger sister masturbating...
9. Ikemen GET!! (イケメンGET!!); Comic Megastore H 2004-07
Her tutor is a guy from Tokyo Unversity. She wants to fired him but...
10. Slut Exchange Student / Somero! Tenkousei (染めろ!転校生); Comic Megastore 2004-02
A special reward is giving to boys who have good grades.
11. Favorite Menu ~Delivery~; Kakioroshi

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/Love-Selection-メガストアコミックス-如月-群真/dp/4862520103
